snippet: It has been so bitterly cold for so long that the Great Lakes are almost completely covered with ice for the first time in 20 years.
abstract: Great Lakes are almost completely covered with ice for the first time in 20 years; deep freeze may help replenish water levels by limiting evaporation and could help sustain some species of wildlife.
lead_paragraph: It has been so bitterly cold for so long that the Great Lakes are almost completely covered with ice for the first time in 20 years.

headline.main: Ice Tops 88 Percent of Great Lakes
headline.print_headline: Ice Tops 88 Percent of Great Lakes
